CustomField.formula: $Label.OPP_ChatterNotif_DateClotureDepassee & SUBSTITUTE($Label.NewLine,"-","") & $Label.VFP_OpportunityName & ": " & Name & SUBSTITUTE($Label.NewLine,"-","") & $Label.VFP_Owner & ": " & Owner.FirstName & " " & Owner.LastName & SUBSTITUTE($Label.NewLine,"-","") & $Label.VFP_Link & ": " & TECHLienSF__c
CustomField.label: TECH Chatter Notification
